creditline: The Mary Ruth Weisel Endowment for Africa, Oceania, and the Americas and gift of Robert T. Coffland in memory of Mary Hunt Kahlenberg
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: rectangular panel; folded in quarters widthwise; medium brown; decorated with freely drawn striped bands, star, circles surrounded by dots, groups of four parallel lines, and roughly triangular brown forms at edges
title: Barkcloth panel
